author: weaver
msg: - Added jetspeed2:build.portal.debug that creates a WAR structure minus /lib and /classes for use
- Re-arranged jetspeed2:build.portal so that custom files ALWAYS overwrite the ones brought down

author: weaver
msg: A Tomcat 4.1 server.xml that can used for jetspeed 2.
Good for if you want to run Tomcat from within a launcher in Eclipse.

author: weaver
msg: HashMap.entrySet().iterator() is improper usage of the Map api.
It was returning an Iterator filled with HashMap.Entry objects instead
of an Iterator of PortletWindows.   Changed to use HashMap.iterator().
